entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
